title: Risen 3: Titan Lords + 3 DLC RePack by MAXAGENT
description:
=================================
Released: August 12, 2014 
Genre: Arcade (Fighting) / 3D 
Developer: Piranha Bytes 
Publisher: Deep Silver 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language text: English / Russian / French / German / Italian / Spanish 
Language voice: English 
Tablet: enclosing "ALI213" 
Game Version: v.1.0 

=================================
Operating System: Microsoft Windows Vista / Microsoft Windows 7 / Microsoft Windows 8 
Processor: Intel Core i5 at 2.5 GHz or better or AMD Phenom II x4 940 at 3.0 GHz 
RAM: 2 GB 
Hard drive space: 9 GB 
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 
Video Card: Nvidia GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 5850, VRAM 512MB 

=================================
Risen 3: Titan Lords is an upcoming action role-playing game, the sequel to Risen 2: Dark Waters. Abandoned by all the gods and suffering from the Titan Wars, a new threat rises from the soil. 
A young warrior is attacked from the shadows and deprived of his soul. He sets off to reclaim what is lost amidst the darkness that is spreading throughout the world. 
The banned Mages could be powerful allies on his quest. To get their help, he needs to find the Mage sanctuary on Taranis, also known as the Island of Thunder.  Protected by the Guardians, the Mages search the mines of Taranis for crystals loaded with magic energy......

=================================
